labels.cannotLinkDefaultChannel: Default channel '{channel}' for the selected attribute is not linked to this product.

exceptions.attributeUnitValueIsRequired: Unit for the attribute '%s' is required.
exceptions.noSuchAttributeUnit: Unit for the attribute '%s' is not valid.
exceptions.youHaveNoAclRightsToReadAttributeValues: You have no rights to read attribute values.
exceptions.attributeDontMatchToPattern: The value of the attribute "{attribute}" does not correspond to the pattern "{pattern}".

messages.removeRelatedAttributeGroup: Are you sure you want to delete all the attributes with their values for the selected Attribute Group from the current product? All attributes and their values for the child products will be retained.
messages.removeRelatedAttributeGroupCascade: Are you sure you want to delete all the attributes with their values for the selected Attribute Group from the current product and its child products?

tooltips.isVariantSpecificAttribute: Variant-specific attribute values are required for all child products and will be added automatically, if not added before.
